communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Kansas Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

The most recent "Veracity Disclosure List". Please include Active and Past employees.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Dhruv Mehrotra

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Expenditures for any provision of disaster supplies to individuals and households, including but not limited to bottled water, lighting supplies, and food products for the years 2000-2024. These may be recorded as annual totals, provisioned by Disaster Number, or unaggregated. Expenditures may include direct provision, contracted provision, or provision via another entity such as contribution to an interagency effort.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Johanna Rayl

title: Request for Your Agency's 2023-2024 Roster & Salary Data (Rockville City Police Department)

communications.communication:
Dear Deborah Levi:

This is not the email address for submission of requests under the Maryland Public Information Act (MPIA).
For fastest service, please submit your request here Rockville, MD Records Requests - Make a new request (justfoia.com)<https://rockvillemd.justfoia.com/publicportal/home/newrequest> , and the MPIA Coordinator will process your request.
Be sure to choose the MPIA Request option.

If you prefer for our staff to key in your request, please let us know by reply to this email. Note that this option may delay our response to you. Thank you!





Best Regards,

[cid:image001.png@01DB05D9.4117EA10]
Maria E. Duran
Administrative Assistant
Records Department<https://rockvillemd.gov/2506/Request-Police-Records>
Rockville City Police
(240) 314-8916 (direct)
(240) 314-8499 (fax)
New MPIA Records Request<https://rockvillemd.justfoia.com/Forms/Launch/d705cbd6-1396-49b7-939e-8d86c5a87deb>
New PD Records Request<https://rockvillemd.justfoia.com/Forms/Launch/a10c9e23-e5f3-4182-a86b-ee957a792971>
